C

ChatApplication - Class in rts.ensea.fr
This class represents a client for the chat GUI application.
ChatApplication() - Constructor for class rts.ensea.fr.ChatApplication
 
ChatClient - Class in rts.ensea.fr
This class represents a client for the chat application.
ChatClient(int, InetAddress) - Constructor for class rts.ensea.fr.ChatClient
Constructs a ChatClient object with the port and the address of the ChatServer.
ChatServer - Class in rts.ensea.fr
This class represents a server for the chat application.
ChatServer(Conversation) - Constructor for class rts.ensea.fr.ChatServer
Constructs a ChatServer from a conversation.
connect(String) - Method in class rts.ensea.fr.ChatClient
connect with the server using the applicative protocol defined by Payload.
ConnectionThread - Class in rts.ensea.fr
This class represents a thread for sending tcp packets.
ConnectionThread(Socket) - Constructor for class rts.ensea.fr.ConnectionThread
Constructs a client thread which send packets to an address:port chosen by the user.
Conversation - Class in rts.ensea.fr
This class represents a conversation from the application.
Conversation(List<Message>, List<User>) - Constructor for class rts.ensea.fr.Conversation
Constructs a coversation object with a list of messages and list of users.
